name: 2 Shoes
description:
HEADS UP

You CANNOT place in the leaderboards if you're using the web version :( Download one of the executables below instead if you want some competition.

---------------------------------

Tutorial 

When starting a game you are presented with a blue and a red tile. The blue tile allows the platforms to reappear over time, the red tile lets you stop the dropper from destroying the tiles beneath you.

Controls

A & D - Left/Right 

Space - Jump

Credits
